metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10893 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflow and buffer overflow issues were discovered in spice-client's handling of LZ compressed frames. A malicious server could cause the client to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: spice-gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
